page.title: 07ST SERFS NURSERY
page.content: As part of St Serfs Primary School,the Nursery serves the village of{High {Valleyfield}approximately 40 children} attend the Nursery, some attending in the mornings and some in the afternoons.{Morning times are {9-11.30am}.{Afternoons from 1-3.30pm. The Nusery is staffed by two{Nursery {nurses}with visits from infant staff in the Primary School.The Nursery is very well equipped with plenty of activities for the children.Because the children attending Nursery will in the main attend the Primary School, the transition from Nursery to School is easily achieved.
